TopicTitle: Science Spread Sheet, and some other comments

Articles.Content:
We the player needs access to the science spread sheet.

for example:

Goo-pod (would only be visible to the player after discovering how to build goo pod)

...Kerbin

......Desert............Ran 1 time for X science

......Shoreline.........Ran 2 times for Y science

......Launchpad........Ran 1 time for Z science

.

.

.

...Mun

......Area 1

......Area 2

.

.

.

It would need to be collapsible spreadsheet. This would allow the player to know where experiments have been ran and how many times they been ran. It would also be nice to list experiments not yet ran or worthless to repeat (maybe in a different colors).

Other suggestions, Buttons to go straight from the science center to the assemble building (or other buildings).

Barometric pressure and Temperature gauges should provide full science when transmitted.
